Title: Merovech Hornwood

pages:
Esteemed Hero,

I have heard many tales of your adventures and it had made me decide to let you in on some research I have been doing these many years.

My peers have thought me a bit mad, reading ancient texts from ages long past for clues to a secret treasure of great power.  They mocked me and laughed at my research.

Well no more!  I have finally stumbled on to the whereabouts of this artifact.  The problem is the location.

This is where you come in.  Should you be willing, I need you to come speak to me at Brandy Hall in Bucklebury.  I can fill you in on all of the details once you arrive.

Wishing you the best,

Merovech Hornwood

CompleteText: Merovech Hornwood has sent you a letter, better seek out a mail box or Postman to see what he wants.
